LanguageData.Yokai_Nurarihyon.label: Nurarihyon
LanguageData.Yokai_Nurarihyon.description: This spectral Yokai takes a frighteningly human-like form. Under this guise it follows the will of the Kyuubi, and acts as a representative of whatever village it hails from. Although Nurarihyon appear human, their abilities cannot be readily discerned.
LanguageData.Yokai_Nurarihyon.tools.0.label: left fist
LanguageData.Yokai_Nurarihyon.tools.1.label: right fist
LanguageData.Yokai_Nurarihyon.tools.2.label: head
LanguageData.Yokai_Nurarihyon_Leather.label: Nurarihyon leather
LanguageData.Yokai_Nurarihyon_Corpse.label: Nurarihyon corpse
